definition: variant of 確|确[que4]/variant of 埆[que4]
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: Since 2003, the Tourism-based Country Strategy has been established and implemented in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 自2003年以来，日本确立并实施了观光立国战略。

sentences.english: Plan law system's establishment should consider the times character of plan.
sentences.chinese: 计划法体系确立应考虑计划的时代特征。

sentences.english: Results The standard values of indicators for maternity care quality evaluation was successfully established.
sentences.chinese: 结果确立了产科护理质量评价指标的标准值。

sentences.english: The principle of orality is established as a basic principle in modern civil Procedural law.
sentences.chinese: 言词原则是近代民事诉讼法确立的一项重要原则。

sentences.english: In order to achieve this goal TheU.S. Constitution established the following two principles.
sentences.chinese: 为了达到这一目的，美国宪法确立了以下两条原则。

sentences.english: Establishing the quality standard of total flavone extracted from Wild jujube seed.
sentences.chinese: 确立了酸枣仁总黄酮提取物的质量标准。

sentences.english: The establishment of visitation right system is a big step forward in marriage and family legislation in our country.
sentences.chinese: 探望权制度的确立，是我国婚姻家庭立法上一大进步。

sentences.english: Establish effective preventive measures and corrective action to ensure that deficiencies do not re-occur.
sentences.chinese: 确立有效的预防措施和纠正措施，避免错误再次出现。

sentences.english: Education and social demand docking, the key is to establish the scientific attitude.
sentences.chinese: 教育和社会需求对接，关键是确立科学的人才观。

sentences.english: The literati almost all agree on establishing the Principle of Directness and Verbalism in China.
sentences.chinese: 学界对于直接言词原则的确立基本都持肯定的态度。

sentences.english: The perniciousness of act brought out the theory of illegal composition.
sentences.chinese: 行为的危害性确立了违法构成理论的产生。

sentences.english: It is necessary to establish strategy of adaptability type quality within enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 企业确立适应型质量战略十分必要。

sentences.english: create protocols on monitoring adverse effects for child-specific medicines.
sentences.chinese: 确立监测儿童专用药物不良影响的方案。

sentences.english: Established that proto-oncogenes play important roles in normal cellular control.
sentences.chinese: 确立原癌基因在正常细胞调控中的重要作用。

sentences.english: Setting goals is one of the most effective character-building tools God has given us.
sentences.chinese: 确立目标是上帝给我们塑造品格最有效的工具之一。

sentences.english: Once graduated from university, the purpose is to establish a career and work-up to the top.
sentences.chinese: 一旦大学毕业，目标就是确立职业，冲击事业高峰。

definition: definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
